actions.text: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3981 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5900-5901; text: CR S5900-5901) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Air Force and Operation and Maintenance, Air National Guard $45,000,000 for payments to local water authorities and States for treatment of certain acids in drinking water as a result of Air Force-supported activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3981 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3981 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Gillibrand to Amendment SA 3695.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Air Force and Operation and Maintenance, Air National Guard $45,000,000 for payments to local water authorities and States for treatment of certain acids in drinking water as a result of Air Force-supported activities.
